content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-11.5, 18.5) with status NOT_CONNECTED
- Boiler at position (-21.5, 28.0) (currently not connected)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING

### Copper plate mine at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)

### Copper plate mine at position (5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

### Lab at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (0, 0) with status MISSING_SCIENCE_PACKS

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that there are no obstructions between the entities you are trying to connect. In this case, the steam engine was not connected due to placement blockage.

### Errors when attempting to retrieve entities
- Verify that the entity you are trying to get exists at the specified position. The error indicates that there was no boiler found at the specified position (-21.5, 28.0).

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
